alert.note: Alert for Arapahoe; Elbert (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 21 at 8:40PM MDT until June 21 at 9:15PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Elbert County in east central Colorado... Southeastern Arapahoe County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 915 PM MDT. * At 840 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles northwest of Agate, or 24 miles northwest of Limon, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Agate. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
